description: This trap is sent when status of any FRU object is changed
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruStatusChanged ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName s EXAMPLE BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruStatus i 1 BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruClass i 1 BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruObjectNum i 9999

description: The textual name of the physical entity. The value of this
object should be the name of the component as assigned by
the local device and should be suitable for use in commands
entered at the device's `console'. This might be a text
name (e.g., `console') or a simple component number (e.g.
port or module number, such as `1'), depending on the
physical component naming syntax of the device.
If there is no local name, or if this object is otherwise
not applicable, then this object contains a zero-length
string.
Note that the value of entPhysicalName for two physical
entities will be the same in the event that the console
interface does not distinguish between them, e.g., slot-1
and the card in slot-1.
variables.name: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalName

description: The current status of the FRU object in the slot
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruStatus

description: The type of the FRU object that these slot can hold
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruClass

description: Gives the slot number of the blade and unit number for
everything else
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruObjectNum

description: This trap is sent when status of any control card object is changed
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BROCADE-HA-MIB::cpStatusChanged BROCADE-HA-MIB::cpStatus i 1 BROCADE-HA-MIB::cpLastEvent i 1 BROCADE-SYSTEM-MIB::swID i 9999 BROCADE-SYSTEM-MIB::swSsn s EXAMPLE

description: Gives the current status of the control card
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::cpStatus

description: The last event related to this control card
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::cpLastEvent

description: The number of the logical switch (0/1)
variables.name: BROCADE-SYSTEM-MIB::swID

description: The soft serial number of the switch.
variables.name: BROCADE-SYSTEM-MIB::swSsn

description: This trap is sent when a FRU is added or removed
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryTrap BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryClass i 1 BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryObjectNum i 9999 BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryEvent i 1 BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryTime s EXAMPLE BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryFactoryPartNum s EXAMPLE BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryFactorySerialNum s EXAMPLE

description: The type of the FRU object related to the event
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryClass

description: Gives the slot number of the blade and unit number for
everything else
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryObjectNum

description: The type of the FRU event
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryEvent

description: Gives the time at which this event happened
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryTime

description: Gives the factory part num of the FRU object
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryFactoryPartNum

description: Gives the factory serial num of the FRU object
variables.name: BROCADE-HA-MIB::fruHistoryFactorySerialNum
